entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He is addressed by his uncle as 'BOY!' which suggests that he has been living with the Dursleys for 16 years.

entities.name: vernon dursley
entities.description: Vernon Dursley is Harry's uncle. He is described as yelling and bellowing at Harry to get down from the top of the stairs.

entities.name: petunia dursley
entities.description: Petunia Dursley is Harry's aunt. She is described as being dressed for traveling in a neat salmon-colored coat.

entities.name: dudly
entities.description: Dudly is Harry's cousin. He is described as large and the son of Vernon and Petunia Dursley.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a famous wizard who is mentioned in the story. Harry sees what he thinks is Dumbledore's eye in a broken mirror fragment.
